alert.note: Alert for Dearborn; Ohio; Ripley; Switzerland (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 1:23AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF OHIO, SOUTHEASTERN RIPLEY, SOUTHERN DEARBORN, NORTHERN SWITZERLAND AND BOONE COUNTIES THROUGH 200 AM EDT... At 122 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located 8 miles southwest of Dillsboro, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Florence, Lawrenceburg, Greendale, Aurora, Rising Sun, Oakbrook, Burlington, Hidden Valley, Union, Dillsboro, Shawnee, Wilmington, Pleasant, French, Hartford, Fairview, Center Square, Aberdeen, Idlewild and Cold Springs. This includes I-75 in Kentucky between mile markers 174 and 176. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 AM EDT for southeastern Indiana...northern Kentucky...and southwestern Ohio. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
